website_summaries.verdict: The Propet TravelActiv Slip-on was well-liked walking footwear because of its comfort. It still came highly recommended for its stylish appeal and support during long walks.
pros: Propet TravelActiv Slip-on owners who have foot issues claimed that not only was it comfortable for everyday use and traveling but also helped relieve pain and discomfort
The style was deemed cute by a vast majority of wearers
A large number of consumers appreciated the fit — it was snug at the heel but roomy at the forefoot, allowing for toe splay
The top material delighted a myriad of users
it was snug yet non-restricting and soft enough to stretch to accommodate swelling, bunions, and corns
Droves of shoppers stated that they often forgot they were wearing shoes because it felt so light on their feet
The slip-on style was lauded by numerous testers because it was easy to put on and remove
Plenty of purchasers liked that the footwear accommodated the use of custom orthotics and pressure pads
Multiple individuals said that the trainer was reasonably priced for its quality build
The product provided adequate arch support, according to several folks
Some persons commented that it was the perfect shoe for the summer because the upper was breathable and prevented excessive foot sweating
cons: The top fabric made the footgear look cheap and it was too soft to provide support, ranted a lot of critics
Some owners griped that the upper material was too thin that it did not provide insulation against the cold weather
The white sole used in some variants got dirty quickly, remarked a few wearers
A handful of consumers wished for better colors
some were too bright in person compared to their online photos

customer_reviews.title: Slip-on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that Propet makes women's shoes in wide widths. I ordered 4E which is very wide & was wider than I need. Because of foot issues (bunions & arthritis), I normally wear extra wide. The silver color is a shade of light gray & looks nice. I returned them because: ~~One shoe seemed longer than the other & was too long for me. ~~One shoe had a weak spot on the inside, near the small toe. The shoes are designed to be light & somewhat airy so I was concerned the weak spot would wear and eventually cause a hole in that area. And the longer shoe flopped up & down on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying these shoes. They are very comfortable and I love the color. I like the ease of the slip on. I was so satisfied with my purchase that I ordered another pair in blue. People often comment how cute they are and ask where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: They stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Although they are comfortable, they were really only good to wear the first few times. Why? They stretch. They stretch so much they are not stable. I have been walking and found that all of a sudden I was walking on the side of the shoe and the sole was at the outside of my foot. Twice, I got into my car only to find that I was missing a shoe and it was sitting on the ground by the car. I have also tripped several times because the shoe is no longer stable on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D. Bove

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This Propet slip on is very comfortable and I love the watermelon color. Of course, i had to add my own orthotic rather than the insoles that arrived with these shoes. Other than that, these shoes are perfect for warmer weather we have now in my city and I do recommend them. I had written a prior review on another pair of this style of Propet which must have been a factory second and was returned. I did have to add stick on heel grips which helped.
customer_reviews.author: Realist U.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I had to return them--WAY too big!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes. Wearing a size 12 and having to order shoes is a nuisance. Perhaps I should be happy to say that these were actually TOO BIG for me. That rarely happens. I ordered the medium width and even with two extra innersoles they were still too wide and too big. I walked right out of them.
customer_reviews.author: CTinOC

customer_reviews.title: Not for long periods of being on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work to wear with my scrubs. They're pretty comfortable and my feet felt fine, but after a 12 hour shift in these, my ankles were really sore. I guess that's because they are so lightweight and have super flexible soles. The inside feels good and there is some light arch support, but the fabric of the shoes themselves is sort of stretchy so they don't really hold your foot stable. Anyway, since I can't really wear them for work because I need something more supportive, they'll be fine for yard work or something. They are too unattractive to actually wear with anything besides scrubs in this color.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: ordered 8 extra wide, but these are very narrow and material in black has no give, and the 8 feels like a 7. Have ordered other colors in this style and had no problem, also there is a toe piece that can be felt on the inside of shoe which is very uncomfortable and pretty sure if worn to long would cause a blister. Too bad i have to send these back cause i really like the black on black. Please make more of these but in triple wide with more give in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Meh, sizing & quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brand in a completely different style, fell in love. Came back for these for something casual to run around in. First pair I received - disappointed. The right shoe was clearly 1/2 size larger than the left. Left shoe fit perfectly. Thanks to Amazon for speedy, easy exchange. Received my replacement pair and they are both a bit large (bigger than that perfectly sized left shoe the 1st go round) Not in the mood to do this again, I'll keep them. I bought a pair of insoles to take up some slack. Guess I was just really lucky with my 1st pair in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: BikerChick

customer_reviews.title: "Old Lady"
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I'm not 20 anymore. Had to get a pair of these while recovering from bunion surgery (AFTER the boot!). Makes me feel old every time I look down, even though they are light and comfortable. Not the shoe's fault, I guess I have to adjust my attitude.....is there a shoe for that? As in other reviews, there are multiple loose threads and consequently, after a few wearings, the binding is coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: dansedufeu

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived the night before I was traveling, and they fit so comfortably right out of the box that I took the chance & actually wore them on my trip with no issues at all. Easy to slip off at the airport, comfy, nice style, cute with every outfit. I will be ordering another pair when they come down a bit in price.
customer_reviews.author: Cat_fluff_on_everything

customer_reviews.title: they are comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I have plantar phasiitis, they helped at first and I wear them all the time, but they are already starting to hurt and I've only had them a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: M. Damm

customer_reviews.title: 5 wide and they fit great! I would suggest ordering a couple sizes down ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoes! Normally wear a size 10, but these were HUGE! Ordered an 8.5 wide and they fit great! I would suggest ordering a couple sizes down for a good fit. If they're too big your feet will slip right out. These seem to be the type of shoes that "expand" over time, so a tad small is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: There is NO struckure in the heel
customer_reviews.text: No heel support. This makes it hard to get on. It was a struggle to get the heel up over mine and impossible to keep it there.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This slip on shoe has exceeded my expectations, however I find that the size I chose 8.5 W is a bit large. I didn't return them because my feet tend to swell through out the day and figured the extra room would work out well. I was surprised by the arch support, which having high arches, comes in very handy. The mess is very breathable leaving my feet cool on warm days. I would buy again but in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: S. Janoske

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these highly comfortable and quite prettily designed shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Clarks, Skechers, and spring step fussy buyer for years due to foot drop and nerve damage. Howe, I must tell you that straight out of the box, these cite Lacey looking shoes went on my feet with great ease and are the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn!! Can't wait for another daily deal because I will definitely buy another color (fixed income).
customer_reviews.author: Showard1387

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes in size 11W in order to accommodate my bunion. The mesh tops are a lifesaver and they fit perfectly! I took the insoles out and am able to wear my custom orthotics inside. Great shoes...will order another color.
customer_reviews.author: jcb

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits large for a 7.5 wide width shoe even with insoles. I could have bought a 7.0 wide width or possibly a 7.5 regular width. The elastic makes them easy to slip into and they have not stretched out of shape in the 2 months I have worn them. Recommend spraying with 2 or 3 coats of moisture repellant such as what is used for camping/tent gear.
customer_reviews.author: Neysa Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not Narrow At All
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item along with another pair of regular width from the same brand and both fit exactly the same. This pair, supposedly a 9N is not even labeled as such. The only "narrow" label is in the box but, the shoe is really a regular width one.
customer_reviews.author: valoyka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. I need to have extra wide shoes because I have rheumatoid arthritis. It is very difficult to find shoes when you have this condition. My only problem is that I accidentally spilled some olive oil on my shoe and I couldn't find instructions on how to clean it. So now one shoe has a little stain on it. But other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Wide width is really narrow. Probably made in China where sizes run much smaller. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run really narrow. Ordered my regular W width based on reviews. Will have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely light weight and very comfortable. I haven't worn them shopping or any long walks but have worn then around the house and I think they might be the lightest shoes I ever had. I have bunions (among many issues on my old feet) but these shoes don't seem to irritate anything.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Just buy Skechers
customer_reviews.text: These are basically knock-off Skechers. I was expecting something more supportive. If you are looking for knock-off Skechers, I would just get the real thing which are about the same price and a provide a bit more cushion in my opinion. But if you're looking for something to wear when you're on your feet all day, these are not it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine if worn with socks but I had wanted them ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 or 7.5 and ordered these in a 7 based on prior reviews. They fit fine if worn with socks but I had wanted them for summer wear without. I plan on adding a thin insole as the weather changes to see if that will accommodate the slippage. Otherwise very comfortable for everyday wear but didn't have the support I needed for long distance treks.
customer_reviews.author: L C.

customer_reviews.title: Propet never fails.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and washable. I still have my first pair of Propet. Wearing and washing for 13 years!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these so much I have several pairs and this is my third pair of white ones. My orthodic fits well in the shoe and walk in them about 3 miles each day. I use the old ones for gardening. Good support, reliable and the adjustable elastic "ties" allows a quick in and out plus support as I need it. Great shoe!!! This pair won't be my last!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Wear these constantly
customer_reviews.text: Great for hot climates: they are reasonably attractive, very lightweight, breathable, and easy to put on. They seem a tiny bit large, but actually they are definitely designed to accommodate an insert (in other words, there is not much cushioning, but plenty of room). If you don't use an insert, you might think about sizing down.
customer_reviews.author: kawh

customer_reviews.title: No Support Whatsoever - Not worth that much money!
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very flimsy shoes. My slippers actually have more support than these shoes. It is true they are wide and flexible if you have bunions, but it is virtually like walking with no shoes on. I am so sorry I tried walking with them outside, and now I can't return them. Definitely not worth $60.00. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: nice looking but not nearly as useful as I would like
customer_reviews.text: Ok for young and lightweight people I guess. Not at all enough support for an older, heavier walker. I don't recommend for anyone that walks a lot and who tends to feel pain while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: DDurant

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: these are pretty. They are so light, not weighing down your foot. I get compliments every time I wear them. Silver is not a good nqame, I bought them hoping they were gray not metallic looking and they are a pretty gray.
customer_reviews.author: ZanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I have bunions so I need to have wide shoes and these do not hurt my bunions. I will definitely be wanting more like these in different colors. I would suggest that anyone who normally wears a whole size to order a half size larger (which I did this time).
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Crosnoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes a little expensive but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Buy these for moms indoor shoes. They go on so easily look nice hold up pretty well for indoors and are nice soft uppers.
customer_reviews.author: Monica W.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is odd and heel slippage is considerable.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these, but the fit is a problem. I have worn other Propet shoes for years and know my size in that shoe, but these were narrow on my forefoot and slip on my heel. I reordered a half size shorter and a size wider. The width is now good on my forefoot, but I continue to have difficulty with my heel slipping. The shoes are fabric which means they have limited structural integrity in the heel to limit the stretch of the heel width. I have tried some heel pad inserts and cannot get them to stick. I am ordering a new design of heel pad inserts to try again. Keeping my fingers crossed....
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Seam on the top of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be very comfortable and they were until I wore them for about 6 hours. I found out on the upper part of the shoe has a seam which after walking in them for a period of time they rubbed my toes and it was very irritating. If I found this out prior to wearing them I would have returned them, but now that I wore them for a day it's too late. I bought them to wear with no socks, but maybe I'll find them better with socks when it gets cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe in Grey which is great but this color is not true to size. It is not a medium width and longer than a 7-1/2 which I ordered. I have to wear a sock to keep it from sliding up. I should have returned them but am wearing them as slippers. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pull on (no velcro or strings to tie) and comfortable. Not terribly fond of the lacy design, but I can live with it. It arrived promptly and securely packaged. Even delivered on Sunday! :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Weddington

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom. She has a narrow foot and purchased the B width. She had to wear thicker socks, but loved them. Comfortable and sturdy. BUT, after three weeks, the shoes stretched and did offer the same support. She needed to buy laced shoes
customer_reviews.author: Emery Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are not quite as comfortable as the 'lace top' version which I also own
customer_reviews.text: These are not quite as comfortable as the 'lace top' version which I also own. The soles are harder as well. And they are not quite as roomy.
customer_reviews.author: gonecrazytoo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight, not much arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Great to wear around the house or on errands. Wouldn't want to walk or stand in them all day however because arch support is minimal. I put Spenco arch support insoles in them so I could wear them longer without foot pain. Very lightweight. Love the narrow sizes. My heel slips out of most slip-ons but not these.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Texas

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks finally found the shoe that is just right!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Perfect to slip on and off. Great support. I have several pairs; one for inside the house only, one for yard work ( they are washer friendly) and one for dressing nice. I have back problems so good support all the time is a must. These are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Don’t always count on the sizes being the same fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to take these on a International trip that my husband and I took but we left right after I received them and unfortunately I didn’t get a chance to return these. The heel of the shoes are way too wide and so I never got a chance to wear these. Not happy as other shoes of this same brand fit really nice. Now I seem to be stuck with these as my window of time passed just a few days ago to return these. My trip to the UK was wonderful even if I am now stuck with shoes that don’t fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was afraid it would be uncomfortable but fit beautifully and remains comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and wide feet . Was afraid it would be uncomfortable but fit beautifully and remains comfortable. Spent a day at Disneyland walking in these shoes and feet were fine. Wish the soles were black - the white is kind of high contrast but really enjoy these Propet shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable travel shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear on my flight to Europe this summer. They are super light weight, comfortable, easy to clean and look nice. I had a pair last year that I was wearing when all my luggage was lost for a week. They got me through airports, buses, boats, cabs and up and down streets. They were the only shoe I had for a week and they did very well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Proper travel sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This show actually fits me with and without socks! I have trouble with my feet and have looked for shoes to be comfortable so I can wear them all day in the house! These fit the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: gls

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: These fit my orthotic easily and they are cute. Unfortunately something rubs on my pinky toes and it is painful. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Murray

customer_reviews.title: nice looking lightweight shoe.
customer_reviews.text: loved the look of the shoe and looked good on my foot. i ordered a wide, only because they didn't have an extra wide. i was hoping since sizing in shoes isn't universal, that maybe it would be wide enough, it wasn't. i reeeally wanted them, lol. if you wear a wide i would recommend them. they were lightweight and again looked good on.
customer_reviews.author: mem

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 97 yr old mother loves them! She normally wears a 7 narrow and that size is hard to find in comfy shoes. I went up a half size for her so she can wears socks with them and they fit perfect! These shoes are great for any age!
customer_reviews.author: dancingstar

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a narrow size 8. It sure wasnt narrow. I have to wear socks with them or my heel slips out every step. They are soft and cushiony and I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne principe

customer_reviews.title: OK...But 2 Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I own another pair of Propet shoes, and I ordered these in the same size....This shoe was more narrow in the ball and toe area and they did not fit my super wide feet...I was very disappointed and sent them back....
customer_reviews.author: Susie Fair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Light
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight. The fabric on top is not solid so would not be good for rainy days but the sole provides good traction and is about an inch high so, at 5 ft., I'm glad they make me taller. The fabric inside is somewhat rough so they might be uncomfortable without socks or a foot liner. That is my chief complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Feet Owners Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: If you have narrow feet these are a gift from above. Locating narrow shoes is not an easy task for sure. By the way, I tossed these in the washer and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: If you need a comfortable shoe that doesn't look like a sneaker, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I put my custom made orthotics in them and am more comfortable than in regular leather shoes. I actually purchased 5 pairs of them!
customer_reviews.author: nononan

customer_reviews.title: A shoe for mom....
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my senior mom to see if the softer material would alleviate her bunion pain. She loves them. Haven't seen then to know of their durability. Will try to provide an update after I see her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes but not for $60
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes too. They are stylish and comfortable for weekend wear, etc., but there is no way they are worth $60.
customer_reviews.author: RCR

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable I bought a second pair. I've gotten several comments on how cute they are. My orthotics fit well over the removable insert. For those of us with narrow feet, these really work.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S

customer_reviews.title: These were good initially, but now not so much
customer_reviews.text: These were good initially, but now not so much. If I wear for wear for longer period of time then my feet start hurting. If you are looking for work shoes, for walk or something similar, I would not recommend them. And they don't look very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Simmi

customer_reviews.title: An excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of Summer shoes! They are roomy, but I expected that after looking at the reviews before I purchased them. I bought a 10 wide. They are very comfortable, and I can slip into them without having to bend down. I just had my knees and hips replaced so this is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, light weight so good for my back. Comfortable even tho I have neuropathy of my feet. True to size, shoes r washable, bonus. Will buy again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeano

customer_reviews.title: I thought i loved them, unfortunately the seam for the material the ...
customer_reviews.text: Medium/regular fits the same as narrow (at least in size 8). I thought i loved them, unfortunately the seam for the material the wrapped around the toes. The seam rubs right on the pinky toe and gave me a blister. I have to wear a band-aid on those toes to wear the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am buying comfort shoes because they fit well and I am off the market. If the Propets hold up, I will be happy, but it is too soon to know. Overall, I have found this brand builds sturdy shoes, so I am optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Hard to find consistent sizing in shoes, so ordering is always a gamble. These work great for my wide feet. The material expands so it's not like stuffing sausage casings. They also work well, if in a hurry, you don't slide up the heel but just slide in and go.
customer_reviews.author: AngelOnTheSideline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 93 yr old Mom. She was delighted with the fit and ease of slipping on. No more shoe strings to worry about Mom possibly tripping & falling.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally comfortable; only wish soles were offered in black
customer_reviews.text: My biggest gripe is all colors only offer white soles. I really wish the black tops were offered in black bottoms. Amazingly comfortable; like walking on shock absorbing rubber. The top is elasticized​ and accommodates foot swelling and breathe nicely. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: TechnoGeek Girl

customer_reviews.title: To wide
customer_reviews.text: These look better in the picture. They are very wide. If you have a wide foot these will be perfect for you
customer_reviews.author: martha o

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable width and toe bed for problem toe joint.
customer_reviews.text: I need the wide for a problem toe joint so my feet don't hurt with these shoes. I need to wear an insert under the footpad and that fits inside the shoe comfortably. Because of the width, the heal slips while walking and my feet do get a little sweaty on the footpad inside the shoe. Otherwise, these are better than others I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Great support and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Mother and she is in LOVE with them. Good support and very comfy. She has stability issues so fit and support are important. Just what she needed. Would order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bwans

customer_reviews.title: you can't feel this shoe when it's on!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of these shoes in different colors. I can walk around in them all summer without noticing the shoe. I have gotten multiple compliments on how comfortable the shoe looks. I have not been disappointed in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mudrak

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these slip on shoes - they wash nicely too
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet welcome very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous except heel is extremely rigid no malleability but comfortable if you dont mind this get a different insole it was hard and not really attached
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes so much I bought a second pair! I have to get a wide width and I need a removable insole because I need to use my custom orthotic. The heel is a bit wide and I need to use a heel pad so they don't slip and the width is a bit narrow for wide but because the top is a bit stretchy, they fit almost perfectly. I only wish they were washable and then they would be perfect! I can wear them all day with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie De Mille

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely order these again
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ordering these sneakers. They are very attractive, and very light weight, and comfortable. I would definitely order this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They fit well, but they did stretch a bit and I had to put something in the heel area to make them not slip off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Lafer

customer_reviews.title: Heel slips even in narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks nice, I have two other shoes from this company in narrow that fit perfectly, these keep slipping off my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lonna L Chilson

customer_reviews.title: Too tight in the instep.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very lightweight and are very much what I wanted, except that they are too tight in the instep area, even though I bought the 4W. I have wide feet and apparently a high instep.
customer_reviews.author: mtk107

customer_reviews.title: heel slips
customer_reviews.text: I use these as back door shoes. My heel is narrow for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: a colorist

customer_reviews.title: Style, Comfort and Support
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I need the width and this style is perfect. I have bought three pair in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Benedict-Devine

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of these
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Wore the last pair so much that the sole eventually wore thin, so I bought this pair as a replacement. Great shoes - very comfortable. Look great with jeans or shorts
customer_reviews.author: PRR

customer_reviews.title: It's like wearing a slipper all day long
customer_reviews.text: I found a pair of these at a shoe store in Wisconsin and fell in love with them! They are now a permanent fixture on my wish list so when they get a price drop, regardless of color I buy them. I have them in the silver grey and the brown, both colors are neutrals so they go with everything, they are a great casual comfy shoe....
customer_reviews.author: 62denise

customer_reviews.title: Black soles, a dressier look, can wear with good slacks when walking is required
customer_reviews.text: I have these in all sorts of colors. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. My only complaint was that with the white soles, which were fine for summer, the look was not as dressy as I wanted for dressier occasions. The black soles and black uppers have a much dressier look, while still preserving the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Hediger

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes runs large in size.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these have had them for a couple of months now. Washed them and they came out just like new (air dried on top of dryer). The width size runs a little on the large size so if you need a wider width in other shoes you may not in these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Templin

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom after knee surgery. She needed a light shoe that was a slip on. Looks like a sporty sneaker/shoe. Good quality and comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not a winner for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Mom. They were way to big and they have no arch support at all. They are not defective, just poor quality, I will be returning them because she can't wear them and they are too small for me. Not a winner.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something like the Sketchers Go Walk
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7 1/2 Wide and think I could have worn a 7, BUT, this allows room for socks. I have only tired them on and walked around the house a little, so the real "test" will be when I wear them longer. I wanted something like the Sketchers Go Walk, but I'm thinking I will like these even better... especially for summer.
customer_reviews.author: VICKI_MOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Narrow width not really narrow
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a narrow shoe, this is not your answer. Even though I ordered a narrow width, it was still too wide. Also, the shoe has no real cushioning and very little arch support, so it's not a good shoe for walking any distance. I like the look of the shoe, and would have kept it and put a different insert in it to provide more cushioning and support, but unfortunately it would still be too wide for my narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: A Walk On the Clouds
customer_reviews.text: I have hard to fit feet - short in length, XX wide width. These shoes arrived promptly and, better yet, feel like walking on a cloud. I rarely EVER put on a pair of shoes and feel comfortable in them without first breaking them in. These were a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Luvs2shop

customer_reviews.title: Propet Travelactive slip-on
customer_reviews.text: I liked these slip on shoes, but the heel was way to large. I was concerned that the shoe would fall off so they had to be returned. The fabric was somewhat cheap, but I was only looking for a casual shoe to wear on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Realist U.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: this shoe was comfortable from the first time I work it and continues to be a great every day shoe. gives support and is still flexible. holds it's shape and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W

customer_reviews.title: Stitching Unraveling
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a great fit but the stitching unraveled. Only wear them in the summer. For $64 you’d think they’d be better made!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Just Found Propet and love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I have already ordered a second pair. I have an extra high arch which makes lace-up sneakers , at times, uncomfortable. So I started looking for slip-on sneakers. More problems, no Wide width, thin sole, not flexible enough to allow for arch support (remember high arches). but I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. They are flat and the top piece bottom gets flat and wears out quick but overall very useful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fits arthritic feet.
customer_reviews.text: Need to change inserts to get better support and cushioning but this is a nice light weight shoe with a high toe bed to fit those with foot problems. ,
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Is a little long in length
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the shoe, but I had to return it for a different size. I ordered the same size that a I have in the lace shoe (same shoe, but lace up instead of slip on), but the slip on was actually a little large in length on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and a bunion. These hurt that foot. They are not as wide as other Propet shoes. I have a 9 2E shoe. I wear 8.5 or 9. I love the color and they seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: True to the fit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way they fit. Never could find shoes that fit me comfortable. These were the first shoes that did.
customer_reviews.author: mary riggs

customer_reviews.title: So happy they come in extra wide sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly mom who has very swollen feet. She loves these shoes. They are also cute with her jeans so she can also be fashionable in a 4E shoe!
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a pregnant friend with puffy feet , what a great gift it turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: shoes too small
customer_reviews.text: These were nice, but I needed shoes for feet that had gone thru medical procedures. I returned the shoes and looking forward to receiving a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I ordered a half size smaller because ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I ordered a half size smaller because I have lost 95 pounds in the last year. They feel terrific. Look too cute. I am taking them on vacation with me in two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth U.

customer_reviews.title: Too little support.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes squeak when I walk and they do not provide enough support. I will be returning 2 pairs, keeping only the white ones, which I will likely wear infrequently.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Lippman

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: WOW! These shoes are a great summer shoe, being lite as a feather and very airy. Bought 10W and the fit perfect. The insole are removable so I can put in the own arch support. I will buy another color.
customer_reviews.author: Terrasita

customer_reviews.title: I wear these every day!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as house slippers because I can slip my orthotics into them without issue. The only downside is that they do seem to stretch out pretty quickly, offering less support on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D.

product_meta.title: Propet Women's TravelActiv Slip-On Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The travelactiv series is here with engineered mesh and a lightweight outsole.
feature_bullets: Slip-on sneaker featuring perforated panel at front and stretch gore at instep
